title: Track Control Arm, Remove and Install

steps.text: Remove rear brake pads from caliper - see operation "Brake Pads, Rear, Replace" in group H
Remove track control arm from hub carrier Note: Illustration shows wheel hub and drive shaft removed for clarity
Release track control arm from lower wishbone
Install new track control arm to lower wishbone
Install track control arm to hub carrier

substeps.text: Install spacer, conical spacer, new nut 45 Nm

steps.text: Install rear brake pads to caliper - see operation "Brake Pads, Rear, Replace" in group H

torqueValues.component: Install new track control arm to lower wishbone
Install track control arm to hub carrier

warnings:
End of track control
arm locates into chassis. Ensure correct new locking nut is used.
Early type have coarse thread, later type have fine thread.
notes:
Remove track control arm from hub carrier
 Illustration
shows wheel hub and drive shaft removed for clarity
 



•  
Remove nut, conical spacer, spacer
